Package gov.sandia.geotessbuilder

Class PolygonGB

java.lang.Object
gov.sandia.geotessbuilder.PolygonGB
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Callable<Object>
public class PolygonGB extends Object implements Cloneable, Callable<Object>
Wrapper around Polygon that implements methods to work with Vertex objects instead of unit vectors. Vertex is derived from ArrayListDouble and hence represents a unit vector.
Author:
sballar

    • markContainedVertices

      public void markContainedVertices(Collection<Vertex> vertices, int nProcessors) throws GeoTessException
      Visit each of the supplied Vertex objects. If the vertex is not currently marked and the vertex resides inside this polygon, then mark it.

      If the list of vertices is >= 1000 and nProcessors is > 1, then concurrency is used to speed up the evaluation process.

      Parameters:
      vertices -
      nProcessors - number of processors to use.
      Throws:
      GeoTessException
